overview_of_class: Numerical solution of partial differential equations by finite difference methods and spectral methods. Construction of algorithms, consistency, convergence, and stability of numerical methods. Matrix iterative analysis.
name: Numerical Solution of Partial Differential Equations
title: MEAS ES_APPM 446-1-20 Numerical Solution of Partial Differential Equations

descriptions.name: Overview of class
descriptions.value: Numerical solution of partial differential equations by finite difference methods and spectral methods. Construction of algorithms, consistency, convergence, and stability of numerical methods. Matrix iterative analysis.

descriptions.name: Class Materials (Required)
descriptions.value: No text book is required for 446-1. Lecture notes will be posted on canvas.

subject: ES_APPM
